text: Joseph David Keery (born April 24, 1992) is an American actor and musician. Since 2016, he has appeared as Steve Harrington in the Netflix series Stranger Things. He is also a guitarist of Chicago-based band Post Animal. Keery was born in Newburyport, Massachusetts. He graduated from DePaul University in 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Massachusetts Category:American movie actors Category:American rock guitarists Category:American television actors Category:Musicians from Massachusetts
title: Joe Keery
